theorem liftT_substT [simp]: "k \<le> k' \<Longrightarrow> \<up>\<^sub>\<tau> n k (T[k' \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>\<tau>) = \<up>\<^sub>\<tau> n k T[k' + n \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>\<tau>" "k \<le> k' \<Longrightarrow> \<up>\<^sub>r\<^sub>\<tau> n k (rT[k' \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>r\<^sub>\<tau>) = \<up>\<^sub>r\<^sub>\<tau> n k rT[k' + n \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>r\<^sub>\<tau>" "k \<le> k' \<Longrightarrow> \<up>\<^sub>f\<^sub>\<tau> n k (fT[k' \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>f\<^sub>\<tau>) = \<up>\<^sub>f\<^sub>\<tau> n k fT[k' + n \<mapsto>\<^sub>\<tau> U]\<^sub>f\<^sub>\<tau>"
